active_skill.name: Finishing Move - Rock Crusher
active_skill.description:
Jumps towards the target and executes a downward strike, dealing Physical DMG in an area. This skill is good at interrupting.

DMG Multiplier: 613%

Daze Multiplier: 359%

Cooldown 14s

additional_ability.name: Overpower All Odds
additional_ability.description: When there is at least 1 Stun character in your squad: Active Skill inflicts 36% more Daze to enemies whose Daze is above 50%.
